system.note: Unique Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Any Living creature that suffers at least one wound from this also takes 2d10+5 Toughness Damage, any that suffer critical damage from this weapon instantly die, turning to dust.

description.value:
Special: Balanced, Felling (4), Power Field

Note: Unique Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement, may not be acquirable elsewhere. Any Living creature that suffers at least one wound from this also takes 2d10+5 Toughness Damage, any that suffer critical damage from this weapon instantly die, turning to dust.
